participant_1.background:

I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court.
i have a girlfriend named luis , and she goes to my college.
i work in tv.
someday i with to become a famous animator and work for a big company like dreamworks.

participant_2.background:
I'm married to a government worker and love milk with my large meals.
I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast.
I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.
I read everything I could about my family history.
my parents are lawyers.

content.text: Hey, what do you do for work?
I work in the government for now, my parents are both lawyers.
Oh, cool. I work in TV and am trying to become a famous animator.
Oh, that's really cool! I've always been interested in animation, but I just don't have the talent for it.
I think everyone has the ability to be creative, just gotta find what works for you!
I think I'm just not artistic enough.
Well, I think you're pretty artistic, just from talking to you. What kind of things do you like to do?
I like to read a lot, mostly history and biographies. I also like to ride my horse.
Oh, that's really cool! I've never ridden a horse before.
You should try it sometime! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will! What's your favorite thing to do?
I like to spend time with my family. We do a lot of things together, like go camping and go to the beach.
That sounds really nice! I wish I had a bigger family. I'm an only child.
I have two sisters and two brothers, so it's always pretty noisy around here.
It can be, but it's also a lot of fun
